duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 seconds is only available for 768p resolution.

resolution.title: resolution
resolution.description: Pick between 768p or 1080p resolution. 1080p supports only 6-second duration.

first_frame_image.title: First Frame Image
first_frame_image.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.
